• Define and lead the commercial partnerships strategy, aligned with the airport’s growth vision.
• Build and manage relationships with global retail, hospitality, and service brands.
• Negotiate agreements that deliver strong revenue growth and long-term value.
• Oversee partnership performance, KPIs, and governance frameworks.
• Drive marketing and passenger engagement initiatives to promote commercial offerings.

• Proven experience in commercial development within airports, travel retail, or large-scale hospitality/mall environments.
• Strong leadership presence with the confidence to engage senior stakeholders and boards.
• Innovative mindset with the ability to deliver concepts that go beyond traditional luxury retail.
• Excellent negotiation and relationship management skills, including understanding airline-airport dynamics.
• Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, high-profile project environment.
